name: Bowling Bowl
description:
Bowling Bowl is a game made prior to 3 days of time. It was quite fun making it and I might expand for it over android. Fun little challenge, don't expect much... Very little is done since I didn't have that much time on my hands...

I suggest that you leave your experience in the comments and tell me about any bugs or anything! I'm looking forward to feedback. 

I Suggest that you guys give the game a try! It might not have much but... It's worth a shot to satisfy yourself and give it a try!
